snippet.title: Throne:  Kingdom at War Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Throne:  Kingdom at War for free on all devices:

Play on iOS → http://apple.co/2bDG0Cx
Play on Android → http://bit.ly/2bYB9uO
Play on PC → https://plrm.info/3H0C6A0

Valiant Lords, fight for your lawful right to claim the throne of the Kingdom! Prepare for a mortal struggle: challenge the shrewd enemies who conspire against you and deceitful allies who are ready to stab you in the back at any moment. 

Your troops long for battles and victories! Lead thousands of warriors into battle and seize power – the crown awaits its King… 

Plarium proudly presents Throne: Kingdom at War – a new MMO strategy game set in an alternate Middle Ages for anyone brave and ambitious enough to fight for the throne!

Join our community!
Facebook: http://plrm.me/2bRauB6
Twitter: http://plrm.me/2bAZpn3
Instagram: http://plrm.me/2cdQxUt
VK: http://plrm.me/2c7Bfxf
Support: http://plrm.me/2bFs4CY
